ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:42:03 [Issue ID 4000-70286] urn:comicvine:4000-70286 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:01:21. [Issue ID 89605]
ComicInfo.Summary: Deadpool gets a new place after Taskmaster blew up the Deadlounge (his hideouts have a habit of blowing up). Now all he has to do is pay for it. He takes a job from an undercover cop who wants 6 high end mob bosses dead. Deadpool, after a little bit of reluctance, takes the job rationalizing that it's killing 6 to save thousands... that and he needs rent money.
ComicInfo.Title: Cruel Summer Part One
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
